thread.title: Jane Mycock

author: Jane Mycock
title: Jane Mycock
text:
Easy booking process, it was great to speak to a human being on the phone with no waiting. The person I dealt with on the phone was really helpful with arranging the appointment and giving me guidance on the tyre I was requesting.
I was given a time of 4.45pm and the technician arrived bang on time. He was a very polite young man - Sean, and fixed the tyre in no time at all.
There was a slight hitch with my e-mails details, but this was dealt with very quickly and efficiently.
Would absolutely recommend this service to anyone.
